public OSDisk(DiskCreateOptionTypes createOption, OperatingSystemTypes? osType = null, DiskEncryptionSettings encryptionSettings = null, string name = null, VirtualHardDisk vhd = null, VirtualHardDisk image = null, CachingTypes? caching = null, int ? diskSizeGB = null, ManagedDiskParameters managedDisk = null)Public Sub New(createOption As DiskCreateOptionTypes, osType As OperatingSystemTypes? = Nothing, encryptionSettings As DiskEncryptionSettings = Nothing, name As String = Nothing, vhd As VirtualHardDisk = Nothing, image As VirtualHardDisk = Nothing, caching As CachingTypes? = Nothing, diskSizeGB As Integer? = Nothing, managedDisk As ManagedDiskParameters = Nothing)
Parameters
createOption
DiskCreateOptionTypes DiskCreateOptionTypes

The create option. Possible values include: 'fromImage', 'empty', 'attach'

osType
Nullable<OperatingSystemTypes> Nullable(Of OperatingSystemTypes)

The Operating System type. Possible values include: 'Windows', 'Linux'

encryptionSettings
DiskEncryptionSettings DiskEncryptionSettings

The disk encryption settings.

name
String String

The disk name.

vhd
VirtualHardDisk VirtualHardDisk

The virtual hard disk.

image
VirtualHardDisk VirtualHardDisk

The source user image virtual hard disk. The virtual hard disk will be copied before using it to attach to the virtual machine. If SourceImage is provided, the destination virtual hard disk must not exist.

caching
Nullable<CachingTypes> Nullable(Of CachingTypes)

The caching type. Possible values include: 'None', 'ReadOnly', 'ReadWrite'

diskSizeGB
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The initial disk size, in GB, for blank data disks, and the new desired size for resizing existing OS and data disks.

managedDisk
ManagedDiskParameters ManagedDiskParameters

The managed disk parameters.
